message: Welcome to our store! I hope you find something you like. Our products are carefully selected to ensure quality, though sometimes we might miss the mark. This particular item was recently identified as low-quality. However, our prices are set at $1000000 regardless of quality, and we do not offer refunds. Please consider your purchase carefully.
